LanguageData.EmotionalBond.label: EmotionalBond
LanguageData.EmotionalBond.description: This mysterious ring changes according to {0}‘s emotions. If there are no major issues, this ring greatly enhances the girls’ combat and work abilities.
LanguageData.EmotionalBond.degreeDatas.0.label: EmotionalBond
LanguageData.EmotionalBond.degreeDatas.0.description: Transforms {0}'s emotions into a powerful force, enhancing combat prowess and resilience.
LanguageData.Ignore.label: Ignore
LanguageData.Ignore.description:
{0}'s transcendent physique ignores or significantly reduces most damage. This physique possesses such formidable resistance that it can convert bullet damage into bruises.

 90% chance to ignore damage

 Bullet damage taken is converted into bruises.
LanguageData.Ignore.degreeDatas.0.label: Ignore
LanguageData.Ignore.degreeDatas.0.description:
Thanks to {0}'s transcendent physique, damage is ignored or reduced.

 90% chance to ignore damage

 All bullet damage taken is converted to bruising.
